name: Jur§olution Law Firm - Rechtsanwalt Henning Krueger
goal:
Jur§olution Law Firm is specialised in the fields of European chemicals and biocides regulations.

We advise and support companies and interest groups in the chemicals sector concerning the application and implementation of relevant regulations, such as:

Regulation (EC) 1272/2008
Regulation (EC) 1907/2006
Regulation (EU) 528/2012
interests: Competition, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Regulation (EC) 1272/2008
Regulation (EC) 1907/2006
Regulation (EU) 528/2012

And relevant implementing and supporting acts and regulations.
